sys_script_include.name: GetItemBids

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_57fc828f9356821094e3f15a7bba10d2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.GetItemBids</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetItemBids</name><script><![CDATA[var GetItemBids = Class.create();
GetItemBids.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getItemBids: function() {
        var itemSysId = this.getParameter('sys_id');
        var itemGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item');
        if (itemGR.get(itemSysId)) {
            var startBid = itemGR.getValue('start_bid_amount');
            var currentBid = itemGR.getValue('current_bid_amount');

            return JSON.stringify({
                start_bid: startBid,
                current_bid: currentBid
            });
        }
        return '';
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-25 18:48:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>57fc828f9356821094e3f15a7bba10d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetItemBids</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_57fc828f9356821094e3f15a7bba10d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-25 18:48:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
